# Construct 3 案例图书馆
https://xhxiaiein.github.io/Construct3
https://github.com/XHXIAIEIN/Construct3/tree/main/notes

## 本地调试

打开 docs 文件夹，在空白处右键，打开终端控制台，并运行：
```
python -m http.server 8000
```
随后访问，即可预览
```
http://localhost:8000/
```

## Sprite Template

Black Onion
```
{"is-c3-clipboard-data":true,"type":"world-instances","items":[{"type":"Onion","properties":{"initially-visible":true,"origin":"top-left","wrap-horizontal":"repeat","wrap-vertical":"repeat","image-offset-x":0,"image-offset-y":0,"image-scale-x":1,"image-scale-y":1,"image-angle":0,"enable-tile-randomization":false,"x-random":1,"y-random":1,"angle-random":1,"blend-margin-x":0.1,"blend-margin-y":0.1},"instanceVariables":{},"behaviors":{},"world":{"x":0,"y":0,"width":1920,"height":1080,"originX":0,"originY":0,"color":[1,1,1,1],"angle":0,"zElevation":0}}],"object-types":[{"name":"Onion","plugin-id":"TiledBg","isGlobal":false,"instanceVariables":[],"behaviorTypes":[],"effectTypes":[],"image":{"width":128,"height":128,"originX":0.5,"originY":0.5,"originalSource":"","exportFormat":"lossless","exportQuality":1,"imageDataIndex":0,"useCollisionPoly":true,"tag":""}}],"imageData":["data:image/png;base64,"]}
```

Blue Onion
```
{"is-c3-clipboard-data":true,"type":"world-instances","items":[{"type":"Onion","properties":{"initially-visible":true,"origin":"top-left","wrap-horizontal":"repeat","wrap-vertical":"repeat","image-offset-x":0,"image-offset-y":0,"image-scale-x":1,"image-scale-y":1,"image-angle":0,"enable-tile-randomization":false,"x-random":1,"y-random":1,"angle-random":1,"blend-margin-x":0.1,"blend-margin-y":0.1},"instanceVariables":{},"behaviors":{},"world":{"x":0,"y":0,"width":1920,"height":1080,"originX":0,"originY":0,"color":[1,1,1,1],"angle":0,"zElevation":0}}],"object-types":[{"name":"Onion","plugin-id":"TiledBg","isGlobal":false,"instanceVariables":[],"behaviorTypes":[],"effectTypes":[],"image":{"width":128,"height":128,"originX":0.5,"originY":0.5,"originalSource":"","exportFormat":"lossless","exportQuality":1,"imageDataIndex":0,"useCollisionPoly":true,"tag":""}}],"imageData":["data:image/png;base64,"]}
```




# 小伙子，你干得不错！

如果我的分享对你有帮助，节省了你的时间，提升了你的工作效率，让生活变得更美丽....
可以请我喝杯咖啡喔！我会非常高兴的！！
